item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-05-17
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• Because @ckirsten loves looking @ shoes. (@ Macy's) #
  • I'm at Five Guys Burgers & Fries (821 Worcester Rd, Route 9, Natick). #
  • RT @TechCrunch Why Does Jetsetter Stands Apart from the Group Buying Croud? It Solves a Big Problem #
  • Detroit Shrinks Itself - It's a 2-fer, reclaim the land 4 nature & knock down Romney's old house. #
  • I'm at D'Angelo (Waltham, 3rd Ave.) (75 3rd Avenue, Waltham). #

Powered by Twitter Tools
